title: Anvil reverts with invalid FE opcode even though the opcode is not run.
body:
### Component

Anvil

### Have you ensured that all of these are up to date?

- [ ] Foundry
- [ ] Foundryup

### What version of Foundry are you on?

anvil 0.2.0 (5be158b 2023-10-02T00:23:45.472182000Z)

### What command(s) is the bug in?

Running specific smart contract code

### Operating System

macOS (Apple Silicon)

### Describe the bug

I'm using cannon to develop some contracts. Cannon uses Anvil to run them.

When I run the code on the Hardhat network, everything succeeds. When I run it on Anvil, I get an `InvalidFEOpcode` error even though the FE Opcode is not being run. Full error:
```
 Error: transaction reverted in contract unknown: processing response error (body="{\"jsonrpc\":\"2.0\",\"id\":53,\"error\":{\"code\":-32603,\"message\":\"EVM error InvalidFEOpcode\"}}", error={"code":-32603}, requestBody="{\"method\":\"eth_estimateGas\",\"params\":[{\"type\":\"0x2\",\"maxFeePerGas\":\"0xd09dc300\",\"maxPriorityFeePerGas\":\"0x59682f00\",\"from\":\"0xf39fd6e51aad88f6f4ce6ab8827279cfffb92266\",\"to\":\"0xe661b3f15d0310af885f4d5c6482c0b5a8c0523d\",\"data\":\"\"}],\"id\":53,\"jsonrpc\":\"2.0\"}", requestMethod="POST", url="http://127.0.0.1:8545", code=SERVER_ERROR, version=web/5.7.1)
```

## Reproduction Repo

Including a more in-depth explanation is here: https://github.com/CoinageCrypto/anvil-revert-issue

thanks for flagging 

https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry/pull/6140 should fix it

I was unable to run the example, unclear how I can run this against a local anvil instance, only got errors with `pnpm t -- --network hardhat`

```
pnpm t -- --network hardhat
```
